name: Fantastic Balls (Sina)
description:
Made in 5 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

You play as "Grean" and "Daniel", Daniel can Double Jump and Dash. Grean Has a Diamond Axe and a Shield. Take them both to the Portal as fast as you can.Be careful of the Pink Balls, they may look cute, but they're dangerous.

WASD : Move               ESC : Pause Menu

1 : Select Grean             2 : Select Daniel

 Space : Jump                  Space : Double Jump

Right Click : Parry       Left Shift : Dash

Left Click : Attack

ps : i had a bug 30 minutes before the deadline that made the mouse sensitivity setting useless,  getting to next levels impossible - i wish you saw the other Levels :'(-, and disabled Music. I couldn't fix it at time because i'm dumb (Also because i've been awake for 25 hours straight lol). Sorry for that in advance.
